review: This fire tv stick has met my expectations more than I could have imagined.  I am renting a home with a tv but does not have netflix, or hulu or prime and I ordered Amazon fire tv stick and now I am hooked up 24/7 to the tv I like when I want to watch it. And an added bonus I get music as well.  I highly recommend this to anyone with internet capabilities to watch whatever, whenever and where ever you wish.  And the price is excellent.
